Name: Creator
Description: The person(s) or organization that created the resource

Name: Description
Description: At minimum, this is a reiteration of the title in sentence format. Other relevant information, such as data creation methods, data sources, and special licenses, may also be included.

Name: Format
Description: This indicates the file format of the data. If unknown or multiple, the term "Files" is used.

Name: Identifier
Description: Unique identifier for layer as a URI. If available and appropriately unique, the original ID for a resource will be used. Otherwise, a new one is generated.

Name: Language
Description: Indicates the language of the data or map spelled out in English. (Ex. "French")

Name: Publisher
Description: The organization(s) that made the original resource available

Name: Rights
Description: All BTAA records are "Public"

Name: Source
Description: This is used for parent/child relationships and activates the Data Relations widget in GeoBlacklight.

Name: Subject
Description: Theme keywords chosen from ISO Topic Categories or Library of Congress Subject Authorities

Name: Title
Description: The name of the resource. Map titles match the original MARC record. Dataset titles altered to match the form Theme: Place, Date

Name: Type
Description: Uses Dublin Core Type vocabulary: Dataset, Image, Service, Collection, Interactive Resource

Name: Is Part Of
Description: Holding entity for the layer, such as the title of a collection

Name: Date Issued
Description: This is the publication date for the resource in the format YYYY-MM-DD

Name: Provenance
Description: The name of the institution that holds the resource or acts as the custodian for the metadata record.

Name: References
Description: This element is a hash of key/value pairs for different types of external links. It external services and references using the CatInterOp approach.

Name: Spatial Coverage
Description: Place names specified out to the nation level. Ex. "Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States"

Name: Temporal Coverage
Description: Free form text string to represent the "Ground Condition" of the resource, meaning the time period data was collected or is intended to represent.

Name: Schema Version
Description: Indicates which version of the GeoBlacklight schema is in use. Currently version "1.0"

Name: Geometry Type
Description: Chosen from: Point, Line, Polygon, Raster, Image, or Mixed

Name: Layer ID
Description: This indicates the layer name of GeoServer web services

Name: Modified Date
Description: Last modification date for the metadata record

Name: Slug
Description: This is a string appended to the base URL of a GeoBlacklight installation to create a unique landing page for each resource. It is visible to the user and is used for Permalinks.

Name: Bounding Box
Description: The rectangular extents of the resource.

Name: Solr Year
Description: This is a single integer (YYYY) that is used to index the record in the Year and Time Period facets.

Name: Centroid
Description: Single point at the center of the bounding box that is used for searching by map in the geoportal

Name: Genre
Description: Chosen from: Geospatial data, Maps, or Aerial imagery

Name: GeoNames URI
Description: The GeoNames URI in the form "http://sws.geonames.org/URI"

Name: Image
Description: Custom field for storing the link to a high quality image hosted online. Used for both thumbnails and item view pages

Name: Code
Description: Internal code that organizes items by their source collection
